actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Service Administration to enter into agreements for the construction of border stations on the United States borders with Canada and Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the General Services Administration to enter into agreements with State and local governments for the construction of border stations on the borders of the United States with Canada and Mexico. Sets forth agreement requirements and terms.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Service Administration to enter into agreements for the construction of border stations on the United States borders with Canada and Mexico, and for other purposes.
